channel.title: Announcements on smutek.net
channel.description: Recent content in Announcements on smutek.net

item.title: I launched my new site today!
item.description: I am super excited to announce that I launched my new site today! I thought it would be a good idea to make a post about my plans. Who I seek to serve, what I plan to do, why I am doing it, and where I’ve found inspiration. Who I want to serve. The audience I seek to serve is small business owners who would like help with their web presence.
